main.name: Prithvi Raj Tiwari
main.description: I am a Web Development, App Development and Artificial Intelligence Engineer
main.bio: Seeking a position to utilize skills and abilities that offers educational growth while being resourceful, innovative and flexible and to work in a firm with a professional work driven environment while fulfilling organizational goals.

resume.skillmessage: I use MERN Stack for Web Development, Flutter for App Development and Tensorflow for AI

education.school: Aryaman Vikram Birla Institute of Learning

projects.title: To Do List
projects.category: This project is a simple list in which the user can write and save their tasks to be done and can be saved for future reference. Technologies Used: EJS, MongoDB, NodeJS, ExpressJS.

projects.title: Diary
projects.category: This project is an online diary/blog app, in which user can write their blogs, etc. and can share them. Technologies Used: EJS, MongoDB, NodeJS, ExpressJS.

projects.title: Keeper
projects.category: This app is clone of Google Keep which has similar functionality but without any backend services. Technologies Used: ReactJS

projects.title: Digits Classifier
projects.category: This project is an AI web app in which user draws the digit with mouse and the app will figure out what digit user wrote. Technologies used: Javascript, Tensorflow JS.

projects.title: Active Shelf Monitoring
projects.category: An AI model that localizes and classifies the item on shelf and updates the inventory accordingly using surveillance cameras. Technologies Used: Python, Tensorflow

projects.title: Face Mask Detector
projects.category: An Artificial Intelligence program which detects whether a person has weared a mask or not. Technologies Used: Python, Tensorflow

projects.title: Xylophone
projects.category: An Android/IOS app which turns the device screen into a xylophone, which can be played. Technologies Used :Flutter

projects.title: Shakespeares' Poetry Creator
projects.category: NLP application to create poetry similar to that of shakespeare. Technologies Used : Python, Tensorflow
